name: haveibeenpwned-zxcvbn-lambda-api
description: Score users' new passwords with zxcvbn, check them against the haveibeenpwned database, and rain judgement on users accordingly (no server required)
author: Dave Willenberg <dave@detroit-english.de> (https://github.com/detroitenglish)

scripts.deploy:aws: claudia create --profile pwnage --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --region eu-central-1 --version production --set-env-from-json env.json
scripts.upgrade:aws: claudia update --profile pwnage --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --region eu-central-1 --version production --set-env-from-json env.json
scripts.deploy: npm-run-all -s clean reinstall transpile generate deploy:aws
scripts.update: npm-run-all -s clean reinstall transpile generate upgrade:aws
